summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to street use; adding new Sections 11.14.203 and 11.14.447; amending Section 3.12.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code to authorize the Director of Transportation to designate public places or portions of public places as festival streets, to recommend the designation of public places or portions of public places as pedestrian plazas, and to regulate the use thereof; and amending the Seattle Department of Transportation Street Use Fee Schedule to establish a festival street permit type.
